subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Edmonton Oilers, who lost to the Carolina Hurricanes in the Stanley Cup finals, gave Coach Craig MacTavish and their president, Patrick LaForge, four-year contract extensions yesterday.
snippet: The Edmonton Oilers, who lost to the Carolina Hurricanes in the Stanley Cup finals, gave Coach Craig MacTavish and their president, Patrick LaForge, four-year contract extensions yesterday.
